quotes.quote: Binary approach is an obsolete school of thought in the process of structuring human perception towards reality. True nature of the reality fits better with spectrum approach.

Of course, technology is not an exogenous force over which humans have no control. We are not constrained by a binary choice between acceptance and rejection. Rather, the decisions we make every day as citizens, consumers, and investors guide technological progress.
Obviously there is no such thing as race, and in many ways, sex is a continuum, not a binary. So it doesn't make sense to label people in that way.

A film is sort of binary - it either works or it doesn't work. It has nothing to do with how good a job you do. If you bring it up to an adequate level where the audience goes with the movie, then it works, that is all.
In our business, things look like a failure until they're not. It's pretty binary transitions.
A literary solution to a binary problem. It might work.
He's soulless. He's made up of binary numbers.
A planet where gender is no longer binary... nor is technology.
As I understand pregnancy, it's a binary state. You either are or you aren't.
It's not binary. You can be decent and gifted at the same time.
Firing a gun is a binary choice. You either pull the trigger or you don't...
Gender is not always binary. People are afraid of what they don't know.
You've been staring at a computer screen way too long, homie. Life's not that binary.
I find it difficult to take communication advice from a guy who talks to his girlfriend in binary.
Life is binary: zero and ones. Only two things keep a group like this together; fear or loyalty - and I don't see a drop of fear amongst you guys.
I'll tell you a simple rule. Understanding is binary. Zero or One. If you understand what's being said, you pass. If you don't understand what's being said, you fail.
We're a binary heart / Tear each other apart / Growing from the same stem / They were us, we were them / On a course to collide / Is it strength not to hide?
Binary, a centrifugal force / Pushing us far away, that's our eternity / Binary, we can't escape the force / Crushing us, gravity is our eternity
I'm a binary code that you cracked long ago, but to you I'm just a novel that you wish you never wrote
Binary stars, / Companions in the sky always in orbit / But never to collide / We're just not going supernova any time soon / We're just two stars out under the moon
Told it to call a friend, didn't tell it to listen / So very scary, so binary, zero or one / Like or dislike, coal mine canary
To see past tomorrow, / today in freefall / A binary motion / of polar extremes / All consciousness split / —dark hole of my dreams
The world is always changing and, right now, the number of people identifying outside of binary categories is one of the biggest and most obvious of those changes.
When we turn to the wider world, we see a good deal of binary thinking.
We're all living in this binary world and all have good reasons for exploring alternative ways of understanding and experiencing.
Sexuality is the area where it's perhaps most acknowledged that something that has been assumed to be binary actually isn't?
It's important to point out that one exciting feature of non-binary activism is the tendency to the challenge and blur other binaries beyond just the gender binary.
Binary options Trading is as easy as predicting if a flip coin is up or down..
Binaries are a complex phenomenon that continues to be defined, conceptualized, and constructed from multiple and heterogeneous perspectives.
A crucial element of binaries-- and hence of the potential for disrupting them--is their integral connection with constructions of the other and of otherness.
Binary representations of reality are at the core of all human thinking.
Binary representations of self and other are therefore vital for the formation of identity, and for the sense of uniqueness of the self.
When binaries are broken apart, new space is made for diversity, difference, and multiplicity.

Western culture likes binaries: life feels less frightening when we can separate good and evil into tidy heaps, when we split off the mind from the body, when men are masculine and women are feminine.
Knowing about binary is one thing, thinking and calculating in binary is all about a human practicing to be a computer.
Binary Codes Usually , the digital data is represented , stored and transmitted as groups of binary digits ( bits )
The group of bits , also known as binary code , represent both numbers and letters of the alphabets as well as many special characters and control functions.
Binary computers use the binary numbering system to represent numbers and to perform math computations.
The binary number system is the one which is used in computers and is based on the fundamental concept of decimal number system.
Chair or no chair: a binary relation. But the vicissitudes of moving the body around are infinite. You never know what a person in a chair can do.
Anyone with a child knows that children learn about the world through binary options: up or down, hot or cold, big or little, inside or outside, wet or dry, good or bad, boy or girl, man or woman.
Masculinity is part of a binary and requires its opposite, since, in the absence of femininity, masculinity would have no meaning.
The simplest kind of decision is binary: that is, the question can be answered, in principle at least, by either yes or no.

Laughter is binary: It either happens or it doesn't. As each joke arrives in the course of a film, the cavernous space of the theater is either filled with joy and laughter or with the quiet of cringing embarrassment. Every time you step to the plate to make a joke, you're going to experience one or the other.
There is a double rhythm in all human beings. We are binary beings â€“ two arms, two legs, two eyes, two ears. Two legs for walking. And the heartbeat thumping in our chest mirrors that.

The virtue of binary is that it's the simplest possible way of representing numbers. Anything else is more complicated. You can catch errors with it, it's unambiguous in its reading, there are lots of good things about binary. So it is very, very simple once you learn how to read it.

This idea that a book can either be about character and feeling, or about politics and idea, is just a false binary. Ideas are an expression of the feelings and the intense emotions we hold about the world.
At its most fundamental, information is a binary choice. In other words, a single bit of information is one yes-or-no choice.
Unity can only be manifested by the Binary. Unity itself and the idea of Unity are already two.

Digital time does not flow; it flicks. Like any binary, discrete decision, it is either here or there. In contrast to our experience of the passing of time, digital time is always in the now, or in no time. It is still. Poised.
